entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
